add-comments-need: To add comments, you need to <0>{signup}</0> or <1>{connect}</1>
add-me-friend-group: Add me to the group of friends "{group}"
addons-changed-conflict: List of add-ons has been changed.
avatar-too-small: Avatar image size should be at least 100x100 pixels.
caption: Caption
client-settings-changed-conflict: Client settings were changed by somebody.
clipboard-contains-formatting: The clipboard contains text with formatting. Do you want to paste the text with formatting tags?
clock-differ: Warning: Clock in your computer significantly differ from the real time. This may affect cryptographic algorithms and cause problems for Moera client. It is recommended to turn clock synchronization on in your operating system.
comment-edited-conflict: The comment was edited by somebody.
delete-comment: Do you really want to delete the comment "{heading}"?
disconnected-from-home: You have been disconnected from your home blog.
domain-too-short: Too short, should be 4 characters at least
donations-android-prohibited: Donations feature is prohibited in Android apps downloaded from Google Play according to <0>Google Play Payments Policy</0>.<1/><2/>Please use Moera web client for this.
do-you-have-blog: Do you have a Moera blog?
email-not-set: Unfortunately, E-mail address for blog {location} is not set, so automatic password reset is impossible. Please, contact your Moera provider or server owner to find alternative ways to reset the password.
forget-changes: Do you really want to forget the changes?
forget-unfinished-comment: Do you really want to forget the unfinished comment?
formatting-hint: <0>Markdown:</0> see <1>cheatsheet</1> or <2>tutorial</2> to see how to do more. See also <3>emoji cheatsheet</3>.

instant-summary.blocked-reaction-and-comment: to comment and to add reactions to

story.asked-to-friend: {node} has asked you to add {gender, select, male {him} female {her} other {them}} to your friends
story.asked-to-friend-group: {node} has asked you to add {gender, select, male {him} female {her} other {them}} to your group of friends "{group}"
story.asked-to-subscribe: {node} has asked you to subscribe to {gender, select, male {his} female {her} other {their}} feed
story.blocked-user: {node} has denied you {operations} {gender, select, male {his} female {her} other {their}} posts {period}
story.comment-media-reaction-added: {reactions} a media in your comment {heading} on {posting}
story.comment-media-reaction-failed: Failed to sign a reaction to a media in {commentNode} comment {commentHeading} to {postingNode} post {postingHeading}
story.comment-post-task-failed: Failed to add a comment to {node} post {heading}
story.comment-reaction-task-failed: Failed to sign a reaction to {commentNode} comment {commentHeading} to {postingNode} post {postingHeading}
story.comment-update-task-failed: Failed to sign the comment {commentHeading} to {node} post {postingHeading}
story.friend-added: {node} added you to the group of friends "{group}"
story.friend-added-to-friends: {node} added you to {gender, select, female {her} other {his}} friends
story.friend-deleted: {node} removed you from the group of friends "{group}"
story.friend-deleted-from-friends: {node} removed you from {gender, select, female {her} other {his}} friends
story.mention-comment: {node} mentioned you in a comment {commentHeading} on {posting} {postingHeading}
story.posting-media-reaction-added: {reactions} a media in your post {heading} in {node}
story.posting-media-reaction-failed: Failed to sign a reaction to a media in {node} post {heading}
story.posting-post-task-failed: Failed to add your post to {node} blog
story.posting-reaction-task-failed: Failed to sign a reaction to {node} post {heading}
story.posting-subscribe-task-failed: Failed to subscribe to comments to {node} post {heading}
story.posting-update-task-failed: Failed to sign your post {heading} in {node} blog
story.unblocked-user: {node} has allowed you {operations} {gender, select, male {his} female {her} other {their}} posts

invitation-buttons: <0>Create a new blog</0><1>or</1><2>Connect to your blog</2>
must-single-english-word: Must be a single English word
name: Name
name-already-taken: Name is already taken. Note that you can add any number to the name (like 'Arthur_42')
name-help: The name must be 4 - 120 characters long. You may use any Unicode character (including non-Latin alphabets), except whitespace and punctuation. Only this punctuation is allowed:
name-or-node-url-not-valid: Blog name or URL is not valid
node-name-not-exists: No node with such name exist.
node-settings-changed-conflict: Blog settings were changed by somebody.
only-selected-allowed-star-preferred: Only selected are allowed, marked by <0/> are preferred
post-edited-conflict: The post was edited by somebody.
posting-not-found: Post is not found or cannot be displayed.
post-not-allowed: You cannot post to this blog.

quick-tips.blog-buttons-desktop: To quickly access your blog, use buttons in the top-right corner:
quick-tips.blog-buttons-mobile: To quickly access your blog, use buttons in the bottom panel:
quick-tips.discover-blogs: Discover new blogs in the <0>list of blogs</0>.
quick-tips.new-post-desktop: To write a post, click <0/> button in the top-right corner.
quick-tips.new-post-mobile: To write a post, click <0/> button in the bottom panel.
quick-tips.subscribe: To subscribe to a blog, open it and click <0/> button.
quick-tips.title: Quick tips
quick-tips.visit-desktop: To visit someone's blog, click <0/> in the top-left corner and type the blog name.
quick-tips.visit-mobile: To visit someone's blog, click <0/> in the top panel and type the blog name.

reset-password-hint-instructions: A message was sent to your E-mail address {emailHint} with a secret code needed to reset the password. Please enter it in the field below.
reset-password-instructions: To reset the password, please enter the name or the URL of your blog.

mercy.clock_offset: Clock offset from the real time (in hours)
mercy.comment_reactions_negative_default: Default set of "Oppose" reactions to my comment
mercy.comment_reactions_positive_default: Default set of "Support" reactions to my comment
mercy.comment_reactions_self_enabled: Allow to add reactions to your own comments
mercy.comment_replied-to_glance_enabled: Show quick preview of the comment replied to
mercy.instants_number_mode: Number of notifications to be displayed
mercy.instants_profile-link: Click on avatar in a notification to open the user's profile
mercy.posting_feed_news_enabled: Add your own posts to your News feed
mercy.posting_media_compress_default: Compress images in posts by default
mercy.posting_reactions_enabled_default: Enable reactions to my post by default
mercy.posting_reactions_negative_default: Default set of "Oppose" reactions to my post
mercy.posting_reactions_negative_enabled_defau: Enable "Oppose" reactions to my post by default
mercy.posting_reactions_positive_default: Default set of "Support" reactions to my post
mercy.posting_reactions_self_enabled: Allow to add reactions to your own posts
mercy.posting_reactions_totals-visible_default: Show the number of reactions to my post by default
mercy.posting_reactions_visible_default: Show the detailed list of reactions to my post by default
mercy.posting_reply_quote-all: Quote the whole post on reply
mercy.rich-text-editor_link-previews_max-autom: Maximal number of link previews created automatically
mercy.rich-text-editor_paste-rich: When pasting text with formatting tags

node.ask_interval: Not more often than once in
node.credentials-reset_token_lifetime: Invalidate code for resetting a password after
node.friend-ofs_view: List of added me as a friend is visible to
node.friend-ofs_view-total: Number of added me as a friend is visible to
node.friends_view: List of friends is visible to
node.friends_view-total: Number of friends is visible to
node.media_max-size: Maximal size of an uploaded media
node.media_verification_max-size: Maximal size of a media downloaded for verification
node.posting_image_recommended-pixels: Maximal resolution of a compressed image in a post (in pixels)
node.posting_image_recommended-size: Maximal size of a compressed image in a post
node.posting_media_max-size: Maximal size of a media attachment in a post
node.posting_non-admin_allowed: Allow any user to add posts (experimental)
node.posting_picked_hide-on-delete: Do not delete Newsfeed posts when original is deleted
node.posting_picked_revision_lifetime: Purge old picked post revisions after
node.posting_revealed_notification_age: Notify subscribers about opening a closed post, if it is newer than
node.push_client_lifetime: Stop sending push notifications to inactive clients after
node.push_client_max-number: Maximal number of clients receiving push notifications
node.push_notification_lifetime: Delete not received push notifications after
node.subscribers_view: List of subscribers is visible to
node.subscribers_view-total: Number of subscribers is visible to
node.subscription_auto_forced: Do not allow to unsubscribe from the automatic subscription
node.subscriptions_view: List of subscriptions is visible to
node.subscriptions_view-total: Number of subscriptions is visible to
node.webui_allow-indexing: Allow search engines to index the blog
node.webui_head_top_html: HTML to insert at the beginning of <HEAD>

show-list-reactions: Show the detailed list of reactions
text-contains-formatting: The text contains formatting. Do you want to copy the text with formatting tags?
title: Title
token-usage-warning: Please note that the token gives full admin access to your blog. Never give it to anybody you don't trust!
upload-or-copy-or-drop-images: <0>Upload images</0> or <1>Copy image</1> or drop them here
upload-too-large: File "{name}" cannot be uploaded because its size ({size}) is larger than maximum allowed size ({maxSize})
want-delete-addon: Do you really want to delete the add-on "{name}"?
want-delete-draft: Do you really want to delete the draft?
want-delete-token: Do you really want to delete the token "{name}"?
want-disconnect: Do you really want to disconnect from your home blog?
want-forget-changes: Do you really want to forget all changes?
where-go: Where do you want to go?
write-down-words: Please write down or print these words and keep them in a safe place. You will need them for any operations with the name ‘{name}’. <0>If you loose these words, they cannot be recovered and you will completely loose control of your registered name.</0>
written-down-words: I have written down all these words
you-at-home: You are at your home node
you-can-copy-token: You can now copy your new token. For security reasons, this cannot be done later.
